definition: car/vehicle/CL:輛|辆[liang4]/machine/to shape with a lathe/Kangxi radical 159
underground watercourse/archaic variant of 經|经[jing1]
to beat easily/to gain an easy victory

sentences.english: You seem to turn some light.
This box is very light, and I move.
A finger or stylus interrupts the light beams and position is determined on the grid.
sentences.chinese: 一隻手指或者尖筆打斷輕的梁，位置是決定閘極欄。

sentences.english: Below gave everyone a good feeling villages light rock song.
sentences.chinese: 下面送給大家一首好聽的鄉村輕搖滾感覺的歌。

sentences.english: I remember Thierry Henry flicking a ball over his head and scoring.
sentences.chinese: 我記得亨利輕挑一個球越過他頭頂，然後破門。

sentences.english: And beyond that, swap them for White Jars when you're doing Light Crystal recipes.
sentences.chinese: 除此之外，他們掉白水晶瓶子當你做輕食譜。

sentences.english: And we need Soda Ash. Light.
The composite aggregate is composed of LWA and normal aggregate.
sentences.chinese: 複合骨料系混凝土中的普通骨料被輕骨料取代而成。

sentences.english: When a knife feels light in the hand, good balance has been achieved.
sentences.chinese: 如果一把刀在手裏感到輕，說明到達了好的平衡。

sentences.english: Learn " to " re-check engine light from the mechanic.
sentences.chinese: 學習重置檢查引擎輕程序從一個機械師。

sentences.english: Gently the willow fluff wafts to the embroidered screen.
sentences.chinese: 遊絲軟系飄春榭，落絮輕沾撲繡簾。

sentences.english: Cantonese cuisine, the hardest to categorize, emphasizes light cooking with seemingly limitless range of ingredients.
sentences.chinese: 最難歸類的粵菜強調輕炒淺煮，選料似乎不受限制。

sentences.english: Titanium is good, too, very light.
sentences.chinese: 鈦金屬也不錯，輕巧得很。

sentences.english: The calming music, drowns out environmental noise, especially if it's mostly instrumental.
sentences.chinese: 輕音樂會掩蓋周圍的環境噪音，特別是器樂曲。

sentences.english: Silk, light and easily rolled up, could travel overland.
sentences.chinese: 絲綢很輕，且易卷，所以可以走陸路運輸。

sentences.english: How light the sleeping on this soil y star.
sentences.chinese: 多麼輕，睡在這斑駁的星燦。

definition: to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
in confusion or disorder/in a confused state of mind/disorder/upheaval/riot/illicit sexual relations/to throw into disorder/to mix up/indiscriminate/random/arbitrary
bosom/heart/mind/to think of/to harbor in one's mind/to conceive (a child)
to calculate/to compute/to count/to regard as important/to plan/ruse/meter/gauge
to stop/to cease/to dismiss/to suspend/to quit/to finish
after all/all in all/when all is said and done/in the final analysis
to cut short/extinct/to disappear/to vanish/absolutely/by no means
to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)
see 壓根兒|压根儿[ya4 gen1 r5]
to press/to push down/to keep under (control)/pressure
warp (the vertical threads in weaving)/vertical/longitudinal/north-south (lines of longitude)/lengthwise/to release/to indulge/even if
classifier for years (of age)/year/year (of crop harvests)
